availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Whitfield (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Bryant Whitfield and Aseanath Whitfield. Married to Martha Utley Whitfield in Hopkins County on June 13, 1855. Father of Eugenia D. Whitfield. Married to Susan G. Browning Whitfield in Hopkins County in December of 1858. Father of Henry D. Whitfield, William R. Whitfield, and James D. Whitfield. Student in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Employed John Browning as a farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District, p. 71A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 769.

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-58, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 18 of 61 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
